alert.note: Alert for Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Saguache County West of Continental Divide Below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 10:30AM MST until January 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Feet, and Saguache County West of Continental Divide Below 10000 Feet. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times due to areas of blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Saguache County West of Continental Divide Below 10000 Ft
